sentences: Contact group Co-Chair Mamadou Honadia (Burkina Faso) noted that the group had met twice formally and once informally, and had concluded discussion of the revised uniform reporting format (URF).
He introduced the draft conclusions and draft COP-8 decision, including the revised URF annexed to the decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2002/L.2 and Add.
Delegates adopted the conclusions, with an amendment to the title of the part of the URF on capacity building and technology transfer.
enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
